programs.name: Massage Therapy Training

highlights.label: Hands-On Learning
highlights.description: Practice techniques on real clients from day one in a professional spa environment.

highlights.label: Small Class Sizes
highlights.description: Personal attention and individualized instruction in an intimate learning setting.

highlights.label: Certificate Included
highlights.description: Receive a professional certificate upon successful completion of the program.

highlights.label: Exam/Career Ready
highlights.description: Graduate with the skills needed to work in spas, wellness centres, or start your own practice or take the exam to become a registered massage therapist.

programs.tagline: Master the art of therapeutic massage
programs.outcome: Become a certified massage therapist ready for professional practice
programs.description: Our comprehensive Massage Therapy program teaches students the fundamental and advanced techniques of therapeutic massage. Students will learn Swedish massage, deep tissue massage, and other modalities in a professional spa environment. This program prepares graduates for careers in spas, wellness centres, hotels, and private practice.

items.title: Human Anatomy & Physiology
items.blurb: Understand the musculoskeletal system and how massage affects the body.

items.title: Massage Theory & History
items.blurb: Learn the origins and scientific principles behind therapeutic massage.

items.title: Swedish Massage
items.blurb: Master the classic relaxation massage technique with flowing strokes.

items.title: Deep Tissue Massage
items.blurb: Learn to work on deeper muscle layers to release chronic tension.

items.title: Pressure Point Therapy
items.blurb: Identify and work trigger points to relieve pain and tension.

items.title: Client Consultation & Assessment
items.blurb: Learn to assess client needs and create personalized treatment plans.

items.title: Hygiene & Safety Standards
items.blurb: Maintain professional standards for cleanliness and client safety.

items.title: Business & Client Management
items.blurb: Build skills for running your own massage practice or working in a spa.

programs.name: Advanced Massage Therapy Program

highlights.label: Advanced Techniques
highlights.description: Master specialized massage modalities including sports massage, trigger point therapy, and myofascial release.

highlights.label: Small Class Sizes
highlights.description: Intensive, personalized instruction in advanced therapeutic techniques.

highlights.label: Advanced Certificate
highlights.description: Receive an advanced certificate upon successful completion, demonstrating mastery of advanced techniques.

highlights.label: Professional Advancement
highlights.description: Elevate your practice with advanced skills for specialized client needs and career growth.

programs.tagline: Elevate your massage therapy practice with advanced techniques
programs.outcome: Become an advanced massage therapist with specialized skills for complex client needs
programs.description: Our Advanced Massage Therapy program builds upon fundamental massage skills to teach specialized techniques for addressing complex client needs. Students will learn advanced modalities including sports massage, trigger point therapy, myofascial release, and injury rehabilitation techniques. This program is designed for practicing massage therapists seeking to expand their skill set and advance their careers.

items.title: Advanced Anatomy & Pathology
items.blurb: Deep dive into musculoskeletal anatomy, common pathologies, and their implications for massage therapy.

items.title: Advanced Assessment Techniques
items.blurb: Learn comprehensive client assessment methods including postural analysis and range of motion testing.

items.title: Sports Massage
items.blurb: Master pre-event, post-event, and maintenance sports massage techniques for athletes.

items.title: Trigger Point Therapy
items.blurb: Advanced techniques for identifying and releasing trigger points to alleviate chronic pain.

items.title: Myofascial Release
items.blurb: Learn specialized techniques for releasing fascial restrictions and improving mobility.

items.title: Injury Rehabilitation
items.blurb: Develop skills for working with clients recovering from injuries and surgeries.

items.title: Advanced Treatment Planning
items.blurb: Create comprehensive, multi-session treatment plans for complex client conditions.

items.title: Advanced Client Communication
items.blurb: Master communication techniques for explaining complex treatments and managing client expectations.

items.title: Advanced Practice Development
items.blurb: Build skills for developing specialized services and growing your advanced practice.
